metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11930 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An invalid free in mb_detect_order can cause the application to crash or potentially result in remote code execution. This issue affects HHVM versions prior to 3.30.12, all versions between 4.0.0 and 4.8.5, all versions between 4.9.0 and 4.23.1, as well as 4.24.0, 4.25.0, 4.26.0, 4.27.0, 4.28.0, and 4.28.1.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
